articles.title: Goldman Sachs CEO David Solomon: 'Hard for me' to see the market's view of seven rate cuts in 2024 - CNBC
articles.description: Goldman Sachs CEO David Solomon joins 'Squawk Box' to discuss the company's quarterly earnings results, latest market trends, the Fed's rate path outlook, top geopolitical issues, and more.

articles.author: Stephanie Stacey, George Steer, Martin Arnold, Kate Duguid
articles.title: European stocks drop as Christine Lagarde pushes back against rate cut bets - Financial Times
articles.description: ECB’s Lagarde says eurozone borrowing costs likely to fall in summer, later than markets expected
articles.content:
Global stocks and bond markets retreated on Wednesday as investors scaled back expectations of swift interest rate cuts in the eurozone, the UK and the US.
The worldwide sell-off came after European… [+3786 chars]

articles.author: Al Jazeera
articles.title: China posts sluggish GDP growth in 2023, population declines again - Al Jazeera English
articles.description: Official data shows GDP was 5.2 percent in 2023, hitting a government target, but recovery looks uneven.
articles.content: Chinas economy grew by 5.2 percent in 2023, hitting the governments official target, but concerns about growth momentum remain amid a protracted property crisis, sluggish consumer and business confid… [+3961 chars]

articles.author: Jennifer Mossalgue
articles.title: Northvolt secures a landmark $5 billion to make batteries - Electrek.co
articles.description: Swedish lithium-ion battery producer Northvolt has raised $5 billion, firmly locking in its position as Europe’s best-funded startup and recipient of the largest-ever green loan from the EU.
